stimulusHtml: Set up and evaluate an integral expression with respect to y that gives the area of S.

features.html: The figure above shows the graphs of the line  x = 5 3 y MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DE7@  and the curve C given by  x = 1 + y 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EF1@ . Let S be the shaded region bounded by the two graphs and the x-axis. The line and the curve intersect at point P.
